item.title: YouTube Channel Purge v1.2.0
item.description:
YouTube Channel Purge v1.2.0
Block YouTube channels from appearing in your recommendations. Easily manage blocked channels with import/export support.
Author: Sp33d0r • Users: 1 • Categories: other • Homepage: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/youtube-channel-purge/ • ID: 2967833
item.author: Sp33d0r

item.title: Dark Connect v2.5.0
item.description:
Dark Connect v2.5.0
Dark mode for Garmin Connect website that replaces light colors with their dark theme.
